segments.text: I keep watching the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on drying that plate, it's almost hypnotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression hasn't changed, still perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible that she can't feel the water on her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she notice the splash or the sound of the overflow?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water is significant, forming a large puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so frustrated that she's missing all the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are just behind her, engaged in their own risky business.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she just turned around or looked down, she'd see everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is almost painful to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to get her attention immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a preventable disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
